text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Why are the networks giving this pos, pathological liar, corrupt criminal #donaldtrump airtime for his babbling gibberish?...these mini-rallies have nothing to do with the #CoronavirusPandemic. Shame on the media at that briefing for letting trump get away with this nonsense.
